findings.title: Owner can change tax and liquidity fees
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify tax and liquidity fees which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or transactions from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can change marketingDivisor
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketing divisor.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum number of tokens to add to liquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum number of tokens required to add liquidity.

findings.title: Owner can change buyBackUpperLimit
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the buyBackUpperLimit, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change marketing address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketing address.

findings.title: Owner can enable and disable buyBack
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable the buyback feature.

findings.title: Owner can enable before and after presale modes
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable presale modes, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has privileges to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake ownership even after renouncing it.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade via setFeeToSetter function
findings.description: The setFeeToSetter function allows an unauthorized user to upgrade the script, potentially leading to unexpected behavior or security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Unprotected functions
findings.description: The following functions are unprotected: setFeeTo, approve, transfer, transferFrom, permit, burn, swap, skim, sync, initialize, addLiquidity, addLiquidityETH, removeLiquidity, removeLiquidityETH, removeLiquidityWithPermit, removeLiquidityETHWithPermit, swapExactTokensForTokens, swapTokensForExactTokens, swapExactETHForTokens, swapTokensForExactETH
